summary: A dark background color scheme for Terminal
name: rcg_term
description:
A simple dark background color scheme for Vim.

Download at http://rcg-pt.net/programacao/rcg_term.vim.gz
install_details:
Put this file in your vim color directory (e.g. ~/.vim/colors). 

Add lines below to your .vimrc file: 
if !has("gui_running") 
  colorscheme rcg_term
endif
